title: 地皮
author: Rammus233
txt_content: 求各位大神告诉我怎么给地皮的权限要直接一点的  最好是能让我复制的

replies.author: Vc丶陌路君

replies.author: Rammus233
replies.txt_content:
Vc丶陌路君 发表于 2015-1-24 19:27
/mangaddp builder plotme.use 使用权限
/mangaddp builder plotme.use.add
/mangaddp builder plotme.use. ...
如果可以的话给我商店的玩家权限指令吧
